name: Jiosaavn Bot
description: This is a telegram bot to search and download Jiosaavn songs

ENV.description: Set it to anything to enable configuration by environment variables.

API_ID.description: Your API_ID, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/

API_HASH.description: Your API_HASH, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/

DATABASE_URL.description: Mongodb token for saving the users data

AUTH_USERS.description: Auth users who have right to ban.
